Posts.Content: On 5/28/2007 Mimimae wrote:   On 5/27/2007 Shirley j wrote: anyone not take hormone therapy but radiation and how are you doing? I will complete radiation  in two weeks and am opting out of hormone therapy. I will be happy to keep you updated on my progress if you want..Mimi sorry anyone who responded I havent been in here for a while will be happy to speak with anyone in this regard --Message edited by CancerCompass staff. Posts.Title: ductal carcinoma micro invasion

Posts.Content: On 5/27/2007 Shirley j wrote: anyone not take hormone therapy but radiation and how are you doing?I had ductal carcinoma and have not taken hormones got three opinions and the percentage for recurrance with was so low vs without I opted not to do the arimidex mine was stage o no nodes involved. would love to hear back from you I am being seen every four months by the surgeon had lumectomy 12/28 2005 three sentininal nodes removed all clear so far Im fine.. good luck my e-mail is --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed.  Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ----
